ThingDef.label: pocket revolver
ThingDef.description: A small decorated revolver, very cheap to make. Accurate at short range only with high damage per second, due to a short aim- and cooldown period.

ThingDef.label: court revolver
ThingDef.description: A large and versatile revolver designed as a personal defence weapon capable of firing buckshot ammunition. Low to medium range and average accuracy, more highly damaging.

ThingDef.label: large-calibre revolver
ThingDef.description: A huge, shiny steel .500 calibre revolver with very strong recoil. Low range and average accuracy, very damaging.

ThingDef.label: rimfire pistol
ThingDef.description: A tiny calibre handgun with uses in target shooting - of little value on a battlefield. Great accuracy, very low damage, fast with low recoil.

ThingDef.label: detective pistol
ThingDef.description: A high quality and highly durable handgun, used by elite forces and sports shooters. Great accuracy, very high damage per second and a tad slow.

ThingDef.label: curved frame pistol
ThingDef.description: An ergonomical handgun with a drastically non-rectangular design. Good accuracy and low recoil, weaker at short- and stronger at long range and with a slightly lower range.

ThingDef.label: counterfeit handgun
ThingDef.description: A counterfeit ancient 45 ACP handgun with slightly improved internal mechanisms and plastic frame. High accuracy and above average range, spikes in damage at medium range but drops off at higher range.

ThingDef.label: soviet pistol
ThingDef.description: A small semi-automatic handgun with a bite. Has high bullet velocity and does moderate damage, with more damage per second than most pistols.

ThingDef.label: machinepistol
ThingDef.description: A lightweight semi-automatic pistol with a quick draw, low damage and very high firerate. Operates at a short range.

ThingDef.label: burstfire machinepistol
ThingDef.description: A nice-looking machinepistol with a very fast burstfire mode, low stopping power and hits up to pistol range. It fires a four-round burst.

ThingDef.label: silenced PDW
ThingDef.description: A big machinepistol or small submachinegun. It fires a three-round burst. Somewhat accurate long range, fast burstfire with low stopping power.

ThingDef.label: folding stock SMG
ThingDef.description: A machinepistol or light SMG with a notorious folding stock design. It fires a quick five-round burst. Fires weak ammunition at pistol range.

ThingDef.label: aviation crew SMG
ThingDef.description: A lightweight SMG with a folding stock which makes it easy to carry, versatile and in working order in a pinch. It fires a five-round burst. Fires quite damaging ammunition at pistol range.

ThingDef.label: modern SMG
ThingDef.description: A submachinegun that fires in medium length bursts. It fires a four-round burst. Its substantially reduced knockback causes it to be accurate up to medium range, but its bullet drop limits maximal range by a lot.

ThingDef.label: greasegun SMG
ThingDef.description: A very simplistic submachinegun design for todays standards which is quite easy to mass-produce. It fires a five-round burst. Low damage, high firerate, short range.

ThingDef.label: aluminum-cast SMG
ThingDef.description: A folding stock submachine gun with a one-piece aluminum receiver, making it very durable and slightly heavy. It fires a four-round burst. Low damage, high firerate, short range.

ThingDef.label: storm carbine
ThingDef.description: A highly reliable, compact pistol calibre carbine designed to fire pistol rounds up to rifle range. It fires a slow two-round burst. Average damage, range and fire rate.

ThingDef.label: police carbine
ThingDef.description: A pistol calibre carbine sidearm carried on the back. Its long barrel allows it to fire pistol bullets at rifle range. Above average damage and fire rate, high range.

ThingDef.label: varmint rifle
ThingDef.description: Semi-automatic, rotary magazine rimfire rifle with an ergonomic wooden design and adjustable scope. Medium firerate, very low damage, high accuracy, medium range.

ThingDef.label: civilian PCC
ThingDef.description: A stable semi-automatic pistol calibre carbine with low kickback and an unusual stock design. It fires a three-round burst. Below average damage and range, above average fire rate.

ThingDef.label: repeating rifle
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern, lever-action repeating rifle with its feeding system in the buttstock. Above average damage, low fire rate, high range.

ThingDef.label: combat shotgun
ThingDef.description: A cheap-looking semi-automatic shotgun which is relatively easy to produce. Has a higher fire rate and high damage output, but low range.

ThingDef.label: automatic shotgun
ThingDef.description: An automatic shotgun with almost no recoil and a long production time. It fires a three-round burst. Moderately accurate just under rifle range, and has high damage output.

ThingDef.label: CAW shotgun
ThingDef.description: A fully ambidextrous close assault weapon which loads modified 12 gauge shells. It fires a two-round burst. Moderately accurate over shotgun range, with high damage output.

ThingDef.label: jagged rifle
ThingDef.description: Ancient pattern military weapon with a jagged, budget design and a strong connection with rebel movements. It fires a three-round burst. Good range, low power, high rate of fire.

ThingDef.label: military rifle
ThingDef.description: Ancient pattern military weapon. It fires a quick three-round burst. Good range, low power, high rate of fire.

ThingDef.label: guerilla rifle
ThingDef.description: Ancient pattern disposable military weapon suited for many combat situations. Has an iconic, robust and easy-to-use design. It fires a three-round burst. Good range, decent damage and rate of fire, low accuracy.

ThingDef.label: 3-line rifle
ThingDef.description: Ancient bolt-action rifle. Probably pulled from a basement somewhere. Good range, Good power, low rate of fire.

ThingDef.label: specialist rifle
ThingDef.description: Limited edition olden days sniper rifle. Great range, exceptional accuracy, very high damage and very low fire rate.

ThingDef.label: hunting rifle
ThingDef.description: Relatively lightweight, nylon hunting rifle with a great long-range scope. Low firerate, high damage, high accuracy, high range.

ThingDef.label: soviet DMR
ThingDef.description: A semi-automatic, wooden design, designated marksman rifle for long range suppressive use against infantry targets. Medium firerate, high damage, medium accuracy, medium range.

ThingDef.label: deadeye rifle
ThingDef.description: A heavy and accurate, military-grade bolt-action rifle chambered for .50 calibre anti-materiel bullets. Its weight and muzzle brake significantly lower recoil. Low firerate, very high damage, accuracy and range.

ThingDef.label: heavy AMR
ThingDef.description: An autoloading anti-materiel rifle with a compact bullpup design allowing it to be operated and carried by a single person. Used to destroy walls. Very low fire rate, high range, extremely high damage and accuracy.

ThingDef.label: SASR
ThingDef.description: A special application scoped rifle with a long muzzle brake and wooden stock. Packs a ton both in battle and when carried, greatly slowing any wielders pace. Used to destroy walls. Very low fire rate, high range, very high damage and accuracy.

ThingDef.label: police AMR
ThingDef.description: A semi-automatic anti-materiel rifle with recoil compensation and a lightweight design. Used to destroy walls. Low fire rate, high range, very high damage and accuracy.

ThingDef.label: mitrailleuse
ThingDef.description: A light-weight multi-barrel machine gun with an extremely high rate of fire. Slightly superior accuracy.

ThingDef.label: box-magazine GPMG
ThingDef.description: A general-purpose machine gun with a large calibre, curved box magazine. High damage and fire rate, more accurate at medium range.

ThingDef.label: replica LMG
ThingDef.description: A replica of the first carryable machine gun, recoil controlled and with a small gravity-fed magazine. High damage and average fire rate, accurate at higher range.

ThingDef.label: replica GPMG
ThingDef.description: An ancient prototype general-purpose machine gun with an unusually high fire rate for its time. High damage, accurate at medium range.

ThingDef.label: multiple grenade launcher
ThingDef.description: A launcher type weapon that fires 40mm concussive grenades at a higher rate than a human could.

ThingDef.label: RPG launcher
ThingDef.description: A short rocket-propelled grenade launcher that fires single projectiles which explode on impact. A very cheap, single use rocket launcher.

ThingDef.label: MAAWS
ThingDef.description: The Multi-role Anti-armor Anti-tank Weapon System: a recoil dampened, breech hinged main tube with optical sights, capable of firing high explosive rounds. A strong and slow firing multiple use alternative to single-shot launchers.
